third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ryan believes Ermes might defeat Levan in their next match, citing Ermes as the most dangerous opponent among the contenders.

Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan has been the supreme champion but is facing increasing pressure from multiple top contenders.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ryan considers Devon as one of the top contenders who could challenge Levan in the future.

Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Kurdecha is a rising star but may lack the experience to overcome Devon.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Arsen mentions Paul's improvement and ability to handle tough matches, suggesting he could win against Arsen Khachatryan.
